API Architect, Java craftman specialized on Java SE/EE (Jakarta EE) technologies and API / SOA Management with Governance. Deep knowledge on Maven, Git, Spring ( Core, Boot, Data, MVC,... ), SQL/NoSQL, Containers ( Docker, Swarm,... ), REST architecture, CQRS, DDD ( Domain Driven Design / Domain Centric Architecture ), Open API. Moreover I ve got experience on HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript, AngularJS, NodeJs,...
